contentSections.title: Blockchain in Business Club
contentSections.description: A space to learn some fundamental knowledge about NFTs, DAOs, Web 3, and Metaverse.
contentSections.label: To learn, explore, and practise
contentSections.smallTextWithLink: Welcome blockchain enthusiast far and wide! We're an online and in-person tech-enthusiast group hosting live speaking events on a range of NFTs, Cryptos, Web3.0, DAO and Metaverse topics. We are hosting regular events to learn from each other, to share your stories and experience, to explore something new, and to practice with some NFTs or DAOs.

contentSections.description: Find a best fit solution to your business
contentSections.label: To consult
contentSections.title: Blockchain Solutions
contentSections.smallTextWithLink:
- DAO/DAC training, operating and marketing

- NFTs creation and promotion

- Metaverse creation and promotion

- Blockchain project launching strategizing (coin listing, white paper and airdrop events)
